Description.Text: Located in Avcilar district, Hotel Expocity Istanbul is 10 km from Ataturk Airport and CNR Expo Centre. The hotel offers free private parking on site, and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. Tastefully decorated, the rooms of Hotel Expocity include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, minibar and a laptop-size safe box. They all have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Room service is also available. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel.
